sections.content: Promptotyping has been successfully applied in multiple Digital Humanities projects:

practices.title: Start with CONTEXT
practices.description: Always begin with clear project definition in README.md

practices.title: Document Everything
practices.description: Use JOURNAL.md for every interaction with LLMs

practices.title: Recognize Limits
practices.description: Switch to manual coding when below 90% efficiency

practices.title: Verify Systematically
practices.description: Use multi-model verification for critical components

sections.content: Promptotyping is not suitable for all projects:

limitations: Highly specialized algorithms requiring deep mathematical knowledge
Real-time systems with strict performance requirements
Projects with extensive legacy code integration
